title: Analysis of University Students’ English Learning Experiences During COVID-19 and Designing Flexible Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based course for pre-service teachers/in-service teachers with beginner-level domain expertise, analyzing university students' English learning experiences during COVID-19 and designing flexible learning approaches

learning_goals: The learner can identify at least three positive/negative factors related to university students' English learning experiences during the COVID-19 pandemic
The learner can compare the advantages and disadvantages of flexible learning methods (e.g., technology dependency, lack of interaction) and apply them to educational contexts
The learner can submit a design proposal for an English learning project utilizing offline-online blended strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
